
$queueName = "SQS_QUEUE_NAME";
 
$client = new SqsClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2012-11-05'
]);

try {
    $result = $client->getQueueUrl([
        'QueueName' => $queueName // REQUIRED
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    error_log($e->getMessage());
}
